r.n: - Moved set_error_handler to parseResponse method from sendRequest. - Added try catch in parseRequest method, and After catched Services_YouTube_Exception, set restore_error_handler. - Fixed many bugs in userXMLRPC method. - Changed the arguments when calling sendRequest. Split the prefix and method. - Fixed Bug#9917, and added the test Bug9917.php - Added more Unit Tests for xmlrpc driver.
